explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the relationship between International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS), Foreign Portfolio Investment (FPI), and the quality of institutional frameworks in African countries. It employs econometric techniques like General Method of Moments (GMM) and Propensity Score Matching (PSM) for analysis. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or other AI techniques are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract. The study is rooted in economics and institutional analysis, not in computational or data science methods.
